content: वर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [वृ-कर्मणि अप्] {@--1@} Best, excellent, most beautiful or precious, choicest, finest; with gen, or <ab>loc.</ab> or usually at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>; वदतां वरः <ls>R. 1. 59</ls>; वेदविदां वरेण <ls n="R.">5. 23</ls>, <ls n="R.">11. 54</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 18</ls>; नृवरः, तरुवराः, सरिद्वरा &c. {@--2@} Better than, preferable to; ग्रंथिभ्यो धारिणो वराः <ls>Ms. 12. 103</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 352.</ls> --रः {@--1@} The act of choosing, selecting. {@--2@} Choice, selection. {@--3@} A boon, blessing, favour ( तपोभिरिष्यते यस्तु देवेभ्यः स वरो मतः); वरं वृ or याच् ‘to ask a boon’; प्रीतास्मि ते पुत्र वरं वृणीष्व <ls>R. 2. 63</ls>; भवल्लब्धवरोदीर्णः <ls>Ku. 2. 32</ls>; (for the distinction between वर and आशिस् see आशिस्). {@--4@} A gift, present, reward, recompense. {@--5@} A wish, desire in general. {@--6@} Solicitation, entreaty. {@--7@} Charity, alms. {@--8@} Surrounding, enclosing. {@--9@} Obstructing, checking. {@--10@} A bridegroom, husband; वरं वरयते कन्या; see under वधू (1) also. {@--11@} A suitor, wooer. {@--12@} A dowry. {@--13@} A son-in-law. {@--14@} A dissolute man, libertine. {@--15@} A sparrow. --रं Saffron; (for वरम् see separately).
